awards:
第57届卡罗维发利国际电影节(2023)
　　比邻星单元奖 最佳影片(提名) 艾米莉·布里沙文

director.name: 艾米莉·布里沙文 Emilie Brisavoine

introduction: “Ever since my son was born, I have been having nightmares about my mother.” Without ceremony and with disarming sincerity, renowned French documentarist Émilie Brisavoine draws us into the universe of her somewhat distinctive family. After launching a charm offensive in Cannes eight years ago with a portrait of her half-sister and her family in Oh La La Pauline!, she now fixes her searching and troubled gaze on a fascinating and destructive element named Meaud: A punk mum who gave her daughter the gift of life and then kept running away from it. A spontaneous feminist and a beguiling grandma. A mesmeric, intimate odyssey into the very depths of the soul, and a powerful cinematic cry from a filmmaker seeking traces of withheld emotion.源自：https://www.kviff.com/en/programme/film/63/40747-keeping-mum
